item.title: Friends
item.description: We have many friends. OneShot Discord We host their “community website”, as a favor. There are many threadselves there. Lapis and Sigil Two witches that are fellow writers. Green is friends with them. One is a netself.

item.title: Introductory
item.description: Here is our claim of stake for our corner of the boundless internet fabric.

item.title: Identity
item.description: There are many questions. Who are we? Your friends, as Red, Green, and Blue. What is NETeSCAPE? Something we’ve done. You are here too, welcome. Where is this? Your browser does not support transdigital locating. Sorry. Why set this up? A beacon to all running from those that hold on to the impermanent. When will this? We all work for things to manifest. Time is a process.
